description: The Jinsei Bara Shoku Riders, formerly called the Tobiuo Riders were a kidnapping gang from around Sabaody Archipelago. They ride on flying fish, hence their gang`s name. Their leader is Duval. With the handles on their flying fish and the way they dress, they resemble a biker gang. Since Duval`s face alteration, however, the gang was reformed into the "Rosy Life Riders", and their purpose changed.
name: Jinsei Bara Shoku Riders
